title.en: Ore wa Shiranai Uchi ni Gakkou Ichi no Bishoujo wo Kudoite Itarashii

altTitles.en: It Seems I Was Hitting on the Most Beautiful Girl in School Without Me Noticing

altTitles.ja: 俺は知らないうちに学校一の美少女を口説いていたらしい
俺は知らないうちに学校一の美少女を口説いていたらしい ～バイト先の相談相手に俺の想い人の話をすると彼女はなぜか照れ始める～

description.en:
The protagonist begins to get involved with the most beautiful girl in school, who is famous for her cold attitude, and slowly becomes attracted to her.

That protagonist finds himself in a consulting relationship with a plain girl in glasses at his part-time job.

He doesn’t realize that the girl he is consulting is the same girl he is in love with, and just keeps telling her about his growing feelings while continuing to fall in love with her.

The heroine realizes that the person he is in love with is herself, and although she is embarrassed by the protagonist’ feelings, she gradually becomes attracted to him.

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.ja: ハーフサキュバスを拾った

altTitles.es-la: Llevando a casa una medio súcubo

altTitles.vi: Tôi nhặt về nhà một bán Succubus

description.en: Take a child half succubus and half human.
description.id: Mungut anak setengah succubus dan setengah Manusia

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

altTitles.ja: うわさの翠くん!!
好逑少女

description.en: Midori Yamate is a 15 year-old girl and is very much a tomboy. When she was young, Midori meets a boy called Tsukasa Hino, who came to the island she lives on for a holiday. He teaches her to play soccer and she falls in love with the sport. Midori is inspired by Tsukasa and continues to play soccer in hopes that they would meet again someday. When they do meet again Tsukasa does something unforgivable. Determined to defeat Tsukasa on the soccer field Midori enrolls in an all boy high school

altTitles.zh-ro: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description.en: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

altTitles.ja: かつて神だった獣たちへ

description.en:
In war, men become beasts. War makes gods out of beasts. When war ends… where do the gods go? Where can they rest their weary heads?  
  
Wolves walk the forest of despair, the wasteland of lamentation, the sea of bitterness, in the time of dark and light. To kill those that were once their friends.  

[INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/803-to-the-abandoned-sacred-beasts?utm_source=mgd)

---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/klotishue)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=21778)

"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

title.en: Being a Maid Is Better Than Being a Princess

altTitles.en: A Maid Was More of a Calling Than a Princess
It's Better to Be a Maid Than to Be a Princess

altTitles.es: Mi vocación era ser doncella, no princesa
Ser sirvienta es mejor que una princesa torturada

altTitles.vi: Trở Thành Hầu Nữ Còn Quan Trọng Hơn Là Làm Công Chúa

altTitles.zh: 比起公主，侍女才是我的天职

description.en:
Siana was a princess of a small kingdom. Until the imperial army attacked…

Just before her neck was about to be cut by the cruel prince, Siana screamed, “Please spare me!”

Towards the prince with blood staining his beautiful face, Siana pleaded with a desperate voice.

“I have many skills learned in the palace. Wouldn’t I be useful as a maid?”

And so, Siana became a probationary maid of the palace. But surprisingly, the job suited her temperament?! When she swept the floors, the corridors became clean, when she kneaded dough, sweet cookies were baked, when she did laundry, the bedding became white and fragrant! She only did her best as a maid, but gradually, the royal family began to warm up to Siana.

“The tea you brewed is always the best.”

“The dress you made? Truly beautiful.”

“I want you to educate the prince.”

But she never thought of capturing this man’s heart…

“I feel the same.”

“…”

“I can’t live without you, Siana,” hearing the tender voice of the prince, Siana tightly closed her eyes.

Look, Your Highness. I just want to live as an ordinary maid!

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらもっとヤベー女だった

altTitles.id: Ku kira dia yandere tapi ternyata lebih parah

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらラブコメっぽくなる彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere Ka To Omottara Motto Yabe Onna Datta

altTitles.es-la: Pensé que era una yandere, pero resultó ser una chica mucho más peligrosa.

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en:
A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.

---

**Notes:**
- There is also a fan colored version and an R18 side(?) story:
description.id: Seorang pria yang tidak lagi bisa menutup mata menyelamatkan seorang gadis yang di-bully oleh teman sekelasnya,tapi sedikit yang dia tahu.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...
description.es-la: Psicópata se enamora de un chico normal.

title.en: Karma na Skill de Musou suru Isekai Harem Kaitoudan

altTitles.ja: 咎なスキルで無双する異世界ハーレム怪盗団

altTitles.zh: 用罪恶技能开无双的异世界后宫怪盗团

altTitles.ja-ro: Karma na Skill de Musou suru Isekai Harem Kaitoudan

altTitles.en: Harem Thief Order dominating in different world with karmic skill

description.en:
Takio Asakawa is an ordinary salaryman who - surprise, surprise - dies and gets reincarnated into another world. A big fan of isekai stories, Takio is immediately ready for his OP slow life adventure.  
  
However, when he enters the other world, he discovers that not all is as it seems. Adventure guilds are a relic of the past, and income inequality has plagued the country. Technology has also progressed to the point that guns exist, making swords and sorcery fairly useless.   
  
However, Takio discovers that he has a special skill - with slight of hand, he can steal from others as easily as breathing air. After recovering a woman who claims herself to be the reincarnation of the legendary thief Goemon Ishikawa, Takio realizes that he was brought to this world for a specific reason: to enact justice by stealing from the rich and giving to the poor.
description.ja:
ヒーローになりたいと夢見ていたタキオが転生したところは、魔物もおらず冒険者も廃れた、争いのない平和な世界だった。
そんな世界の街を歩いていると、彼は倉庫に捕らわれた一人の少女・イシカワ＝ユエを救出する。
タキオは彼女を助け出したことで、自分の持つ特殊な能力に気づいた。
すると、ユエからいきなり「一緒にすべての財宝を盗みましょう」と提案され――！

description.en:
**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

title.en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Kız Arkadaşım Hakkında Endileşeniyorum

altTitles.ro: Sunt Îngrijorat Pentru Iubita Mea, Care Obișnuia să Fie Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.es-la: Estoy preocupado por mi novia que solía estar cubierta de moretones

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).
description.es-la: Continuación de [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

altTitles.ja: 俺ともう一度、初恋。

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore to mou Ichido First Love.

description.en:
I fell in love with fate. But the memory of that love disappeared. Four men were waiting for her when she lost her memory. It seems that just before she lost her memory, she chose one of these men as her fiancé. She had even decided to get engaged, but now she has to redo her first love. You might already be in a trap!

All of them are seriously trying to get married, and the exciting reverse love story is about to begin!

altTitles.ja: めい☆コン

description.en: After graduating from their constant fighting, some magical girls were unable to keep up in class, got poor grades, and became NEETs. In order to help these poor former magical girls, the cleaning company "Mei Company" was founded! Will swapping their magical staffs for cleaning tools help to rehabilitate them? Gate protagonist Itami's beloved doujin manga about former magical girls cleaning up messes.

altTitles.ja: シリアルキラー異世界に降り立つ

altTitles.en: The Serial Killer Descends Into Another World
The serial killer is reincarnated into the another world.

altTitles.es-la: Un asesino serial ha descendido a otro mundo

altTitles.de: Serienkiller in einer anderen Welt reinkarniert

description.de:
Ein Mörder, der den Drang, Menschen zu töten, nicht stoppen kann, obwohl er damit aufhören will, erhält das von ihm gewünschte Todesurteil.
Seine Freude ist nur von kurzer Dauer, denn er wird in einer anderen Welt reinkarniert. Der Auftrag, den ihm die Göttin erteilt hat, besteht darin, 12 reinkarnierte Menschen mit seinen mörderischen Impulsen zu töten.
Nicht alle reinkarnierten Menschen sind Heilige!
description.en:
A murderer who cannot stop the urge to kill people, even though he wants to stop, receives the death sentence he wants.
His joy is short-lived, as he is reincarnated in another world. The mission entrusted to him by the goddess is to kill 12 reincarnated people using his murderous impulses.
Not all reincarnated people are saints!

title.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death

description.en:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

altTitles.ja: キミと恋の途中

description.en:
Just when I thought it'd start with you, you disappeared; I would've never thought this… Yuna has lost trust in love after her first boyfriend Takumi broke up with her. Hayato from her class has already confessed to her twice and now finally she approached onto love another time. But Takumi appears in front of her!! What will the swaying Yuna do!?  
  
Note: Volume 3 includes the oneshots “Kirameki ☆ Lucky Charm” and “Kirakira 17.”

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.
description.pt-br:
Vivendo da venda de informações sobre monstros, Maeng Siwoo é considerado completamente inútil na indústria de caçadores, sem quaisquer qualidades de destaque. No entanto, ele luta ferozmente para sustentar seu irmão mais novo doente.

Um dia fatídico, ele recebe um misterioso smartphone de um ser transcendente dentro de uma masmorra, nomeando-o como gerente de canal de tais seres. Ao se inscrever no canal, ele desbloqueia a habilidade de exercer os poderes dos deuses.

altTitles.ja: 時森さんが無防備です!!

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！

title.en: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Orusuban Imouto no Yume wo Minai

altTitles.ja: 青春ブタ野郎はおるすばん妹の夢を見ない

altTitles.ru: Этот глупый свин не понимает мечту сестры-домоседки

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Orusuban Imouto no Yume wo Minai

altTitles.en: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Sister Home Alone

description.en:
The Kaede arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga!

Another day of house-sitting for Azusagawa Kaede. As long as her beloved onii-chan is by her side, she was fine with staying home all day, but a desire to change has started growing in her mind...
Experience the adolescence story, with Kaede as the main character, in a way only possible through manga.

*From ComicWalker, translated*
description.pt-br:
O arco Kaede da série "Rascal", obras populares da Dengeki Bunko, serializadas como mangá!

Mais um dia de cuidar da casa para Azusagawa Kaede. Enquanto seu amado irmão mais velho estiver ao seu lado, ela está bem em ficar em casa o dia todo, mas um desejo de mudança começou a crescer em sua mente...
Experimente a história da adolescência, com Kaede como personagem principal, de uma maneira só possível através do mangá.

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
  
---

**Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]

altTitles.de: Ich würde mir gerne eine Freundin ausleihen

altTitles.th: สะดุดรักยัยแฟนเช่า

altTitles.ja: かのかり
彼女、お借りします

altTitles.vi: Dịch Vụ Cho Thuê Bạn Gái

description.en:
Kinoshita Kazuya is a regular college student who was just dumped by his girlfriend for another guy. Feeling down in the dumps, he decides to use an app called Diamond to hire Mizuhara Chizuru, a rental girlfriend, to make himself feel better. From their first meeting, she seems to be the perfect girl for him, but is there more to her than meets the eye? And how will their not quite typical relationship develop?

---
**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
description.fr: Kinoshita Kazuya est un étudiant régulier qui vient d'être largué par sa petite amie pour un autre gars. Se sentant dans les décharges, il décide d'utiliser une application appelée Diamond pour embaucher Mizuhara Chizuru, une petite amie de location, afin de se sentir mieux. Dès leur première rencontre, elle semble être la fille parfaite pour lui, mais est-ce qu'il y a autre chose pour elle que ce qui est à l'oeil? Et comment va se développer leur relation pas tout à fait typique?
description.it: Kinoshita Kazuya è un normale studente universitario che è stato appena lasciato dalla sua ragazza. Devastato, decide di usare un app chiamata "Diamond" per reclutare Mizuhara Chizuru, una ragazza a noleggio per tirargli su il morale. Fin dal loro primo incontro, sembra essere la ragazza perfetta per lui, ma ci sarà altro dietro a quell'immagine da "brava ragazza"…? E come si evolverà la loro inusuale relazione?
description.pt: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar uma aplicação de relacionamentos depois de ter levado terminado com a sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!
description.ru: Двадцатилетний никудышный студент университета муниципального района Киносита Кадзуя. Встреча с «особенной» красавицей ознаменует начало изменений в его жизни?!
description.es-la: Kinoshita Kazuya es un estudiante universitario normal al que su novia acaba de dejar por otro chico. Sintiéndose deprimido, decide usar una aplicación llamada Diamond para contratar a Mizuhara Chizuru, una novia de alquiler, para sentirse mejor. Desde su primer encuentro con ella, parece ser la chica perfecta para él, pero ¿hay más en ella de lo que parece? ¿Y cómo se desarrollará su relación no muy típica?
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar um aplicativo de relacionamentos depois de ter levado um fora de sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: Multiverse no Watashi, Koishite Ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: マルチバースの私、恋していいですか?

altTitles.ja-ro: Maruchibāsu no Watashi, Koishite Ii desu ka?

altTitles.en: Is It Alright for My Multiverse Self to Fall in Love?

description.en:
If things had gone differently, we might never have met, you and I.

Would you have any regrets if you never said "I love you"?

Exploring endless possibilities in this multiverse rom-com one-shot!

altTitles.ja: ちるらん 新撰組鎮魂歌【レクイエム】

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.

altTitles.ja: まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

altTitles.zh-hk: 想盡情享受的常客小姐

altTitles.zh: 想尽情享受的常客小姐

description.en:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

altTitles.ja: 部長島耕作

description.en: Division Chief Shima Kōsaku is the second part of a series about a fictional salaryman named Shima Kōsaku, a Japanese white-collar worker who devotes his life to his company, Hatsushiba Electric.

title.en: Zom 100 ~100 Things I Want to do Before I Become a Zombie~

altTitles.ja-ro: Zombie 100 ~Zombie ni Naru Made ni Shitai 100 no Koto~

altTitles.en: Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead
Zombie 100 ~100 Things I Want to do Before I Become a Zombie~

altTitles.ru: Зомбиапокалипсис и список из 100 дел, что я выполню перед смертью

altTitles.ja: ゾン１００～ゾンビになるまでにしたい１００のこと～

altTitles.ja-ro: Zombie 100 ~Zombie ni Naru Made ni Shitai 100 no Koto~

altTitles.pt-br: Zombie 100 ~Coisas para fazer antes de virar zumbi~

altTitles.ka: Zombie 100 ~ 100 რამ, რაც მინდა გავაკეთო სანამ ზომბი გავხდები ~

altTitles.pt-br: Zom 100: Lista de Desejos dos Mortos

description.en:
After three years of working for a black company, Akira was exhausted both mentally and physically.  
But one morning, what he saw on his usual way to work was nothing but a town full of zombies.   
How will the former company slave, Akira, live his life in a world that has completely changed overnight!?  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead** (2023)
description.fr:
Après s'être fait exploiter pendant trois ans dans une entreprise, Akira est épuisé mentalement et physiquement. En se rendant à son travail un matin, il découvre une ville pleine de zombies. Comment l'ancien esclave d'entreprise qu'il était appréhendera sa vie dans un monde qui a complètement changé du jour au lendemain ?  


---

**Links:**  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kosamehal)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/asoharoo)
description.pt-br: Depois de três anos trabalhando para uma empresa exploradora, Akira estava exausto, tanto mentalmente, quanto fisicamente. Mas uma manhã, o que ele viu no caminho habitual para o trabalho não passava de uma cidade cheia de zumbis. Como o ex-escravo da empresa, Akira, viverá sua vida em um mundo que mudou completamente da noite para o dia?

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女♡三十路

description.en: A 35-year-old OL one day suddenly turns into a magical girl.

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.

---
  - Alternative English Translation: [<comikey>](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

description.en:
Working beauty x working beauty. Romance stories about adult women.

This is a collection of short stories of 2 pages each, about various combinations of characters from the novel version of the "Saturday" series written by Seria Nina and illustrated by Hazuki Ruri.

title.en: Playboy Repents and is Reborn into a Complicated Relationship with Five People

altTitles.zh: 海王从良后陷入了五等分修罗场

altTitles.en: The Playboy Has Reformed After Falling Into Five Equal Love Complex

altTitles.id: Si Playboy yang Bereinkarnasi Terjebak dengan Lima Haremnya

altTitles.zh-ro: Hǎiwáng Cóngliáng Hòu Xiànrùle Wǔ Děng Fēn Xiūluō Chǎng
Haiwang Congliang Hou Xianrule Wu Deng Fen Xiuluo Chang

description.en: The playboy is reborn at a crucial moment in '1 Day with 4 Suitors.' To survive, he sends them all breakup letters and runs away. Unexpectedly, his exes all rush to seduce him, and the guy he sought shelter with seems to have increasingly intense eyes each day! I've fallen into a complicated situationship with too many people. How do I deal with having too many husbands?

title.en: The Words of The Beloved Sun

description.en: ‘One will become king, and the other will become a sacrifice for the king.’ On the day Crown Princes Tae Chanryang and Tae Howol were born, a prophecy came down from the heavens. Who will be the last to survive?

Life was a mundane chore for student council member Hasumi Ryou until he picked up a charm on the floor. Suddenly, a junior high-school student with bad grades appears in his room calling him Kami-sama (God-sama) and asks for help to pass her high school entrance exam. Not to mention that it doesn't make sense that his room changes into hers everyday after school. Ryou abandons all logic and decides to go with the flow, his heart touched by the earnest desire of the girl who wants to graduate to high school.

altTitles.ja: 恋の幽霊

description.en:
A heartwarming ghost comedy BL by the author of *Ore ga Shuyaku na Wake ga Nai!* ☆

One day, high school student Aragaki notices that a ghost is haunting him. Aragaki thought he was the only person who can see the ghost, until his crush and classmate, Asahikawa, points it out! What's more, Asahikawa says that the ghost told him that Aragaki likes him...? Could this eerie situation actually lead to Aragaki finding love through the help of this ghost?

The family crumbled like a sand castle in the blink of an eye after their father's suicide. I became the head of the family and had to take responsibility for my mother who lost her mind and my blind little sister who goes to a special school. For the sake of my family, I'm going to start my own gang at the strongest gang school in Busan. Hot action for a cold world.
description.ru: Семья рассыпалась в мгновение ока, словно замок из песка, после самоубийства отца. Я стал главой семьи и мне пришлось взять ответственность за потерявшую рассудок мать и слепую младшую сестру, которая ходит в специальную школу. Ради семьи я собираюсь создать свою собственную банду в самой сильной гангстерской школе в Пусане. Горячий экшн для холодного мира.

altTitles.ja: 編み編みロマンス

description.en: Momiji knits a sweater for her friend, Yunobe, who's going to be in the school's Christmas fashion show.

Hiroyuki is your typical 16 year old boy just starting to live on his own. He got a great deal on a house, but when he's just moving in, he meets Milky Way. Milky is a demoness and she wants Hiroyuki to be her servant! Hiroyuki's life is about to be turned upside-down in magic, demons and love triangles.

altTitles.ja: スーパーボールガールズ

description.en: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami và Cuộc sống diệu kì!

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

altTitles.ja: エリオと電気人形

description.en: The story centers around Anjie, an electric doll, and Erio, a human raised by her. In order for Erio to experience the outside world, the two set out on a journey.

altTitles.ja: はやくしたいふたり

description.en:
Yuuri and Keiichirou fell in love as they shared the same route to neighboring high schools every day. But it turns out Keiichirou comes from a prestigious family where his father and grandfather were both prime ministers. The family rules strictly forbids him from having any inappropriate relations with a woman until he turns 18. Can he resist Yuuri's flirting?  


---
description.vi:
Hasegawa Yuuri, một học sinh cao trung bình thường luôn có ước mơ được “chim chuột” với người yêu. Cô đang hẹn hò với Katsuragi Keiichirou – tương lai sẽ trở thành người đứng đầu đất nước?! Và đặc biệt, trong gia đình của Keiichirou lại có truyền thống kì lạ về chuyện “ấy”? Làm thế nào Yuuri có thể chấp nhận được chuyện này?? Hãy cùng đón xem câu chuyện siêu đáng yêu của cặp đôi chênh lệnh nhất mọi thời đại này nào!!  
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/aki_kusaka)

title.en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~

altTitles.ja: めざせ豪華客船!!　～船召喚スキルで異世界リッチライフを手に入れろ～

altTitles.ko: 노려라 호화객선!! 배 소환 스킬로 이세계 부자 라이프를 손에 넣어라

altTitles.en: Striving for the Luxury Liner!! Get that Rich Isekai Life with a Ship Summoning Skill

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

You must take the fall with me.The abuse people suffer during their childhood will all burst out all at once when they grow up. Some people choose to vent their anger to the outside world, but some people will only keep it in and torture themselvesThis is quite literally the description from bilibili 😭 - Kora

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!
